metadata.title: CVE-2023-52475 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:Input: powermate - fix use-after-free in powermate_config_completesyzbot has found a use-after-free bug [1] in the powermate driver. Thishappens when the device is disconnected, which leads to a memory free fromthe powermate_device struct.  When an asynchronous control messagecompletes after the kfree and its callback is invoked, the lock does notexist anymore and hence the bug.Use usb_kill_urb() on pm->config to cancel any in-progress requests upondevice disconnection.[1] https://syzkaller.appspot.com/bug?extid=0434ac83f907a1dbdd1e

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
